noun.description: A synthetic, crystalline, neutral compound having a bicyclic molecular structure, used as a central nervous system and respiratory stimulant; 1,5-pentamethylenetetrazole, C₆H₁₀N₄. [A trademark for this drug is Metrazol.]

origin: 1940s; earliest use found in New Gould Medical Dictionary. From pentylene- + tetrazole.
